text:
<@U0KM55L9E|arielevycohen> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/arielevycohen/F2828P0TT/sept_6th_invite_singulardtv.pdf|TO ALL NEW YORKERS> and commented: ARTISTS  UNITE  TO  USHER  IN  A  NEW  EPOCH
WHERE  TRANSPARENCY  &  DIGITAL RIGHTS  ARE  PROPERTY  OF  CREATORS

Please join our pre-launch Keynote Reception next Tuesday September 6th, at the Microsoft Technology Center in Times Square.

This is a private, invite only event and your RSVP* is kindly required.  

Invitation attached and additional details immediately below:
 
6:30pm - Arrivals
7pm (promptly) - Keynote - Radio City Room, 6th Floor
(Zach LeBeau, Joe Lubin, Arie Levy-Cohen and Kim Jackson)  
7:30pm - Reception -  Terrace, 7th Floor

 
Microsoft Technology Center
11 Times Square -  Radio City Room, 6th Floor

RSVP : <mailto:contact@singularDTV.com|contact@singularDTV.com> 

(*Only guests on the list will be admitted by building security - photo ID required)

Arrive Promptly as Building Doors Close @ 7pm
 
We look forward to seeing you there.

<http://www.SingularDTV.com|www.SingularDTV.com>
